marklogic.body: Shelling attacks and by regime... reports coming in minute by minute..... very widespread... Homs, Daraa & Hama. Explosions in Qatana, Kernaz heavy Raid continuing, Sahl Al Ghab stormed the village of Qabr Fidha amid a campaign of arrests and Burning several homes and stealing from shops. Another child martyr Mohammad Ahmad Kamal Mousa was killed and another child injured as a result of security forces' sporadic shooting in the town.God protect Syria today....
